media:group.media:title: This is Not Watermelon...
media:group.media:description:
Her name is “Mizuki”. She is a weather news anchor/forecaster/presenter/reporter/ of a famous weather program in Japan.
Follow her on social media: Twitter: https://twitter.com/mizuki_tokita Instagram: https://instagram.com/mizuki_tokita
ABOUT MIZUKI TOKITA People calls her “Mizuki” or “Mii-chan" 戸北美月 (Japanese Kanji name) Born December 29 1999 Blood type O In Fukuoka City, Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan Capricorn (constellation) Height: 169 cm
Education: Doshisha University
Pets: Rabbit (name/Watage) Hobbies: Sake brewery tour, cooking, piano Sports: Swimming, Work out, Hit the gym Special skill: Japanese Sake test second grade
▼The weather show she appears on https://www.youtube.com/weathernews
She works in WEATHER NEWS INC. (Japan)
Search for "weathernews web910" and in that page, you can see their schedule at the right side of screen for upcoming 24 hours.
Video editor: @WeatherNewFans (this channel) Contact : weathernewfans@gmail.com Twitter: https://twitter.com/weathernewfans
▼Join us! We have a Patreon community! https://www.patreon.com/wnfans
#mizukitokita #Weathernews #Japan

media:group.media:description:
Her name is “RINON”. She is a weather news anchor/forecaster/presenter/reporter/ of a famous weather program in Japan.
Thank you for Follow her on social media: Twitter: https://twitter.com/rinon_ohshima Instagram: https://instagram.com/rinon_ohshima
ABOUT RINON OHSHIMA People calls her “RINON” or “Non-chan" 大島璃音 (Japanese Kanji name) Born March 19 1999 In Tokyo, Japan Pisces (constellation) Height 163cm
Education: Aoyama Gakuin University(Department of French Literature)
Hobbies: Cooking, reading, musical , Formula One Pets: Dog(name/ChaCha) and Cat(name/Ciel) Favorite colors: Red, Black Favorite fruits: strawberry instruments: piano, flute, violin She had been a member of an orchestra in Tokyo. Sports: Baton twirling Special skill: World Heritage Certificate Level 3, French Language Certificate Level 3
▼The weather show she appears on https://www.youtube.com/weathernews
She works in WEATHER NEWS INC. (Japan)
